1123112775130144768.text:
[ITAM Games X MakerDAO]

#ITAMGames adopts #Dai #Stablecoin for our gaming ecosystem! 
ITAM Games and @MakerDAO have partnered up to solve the problem of token volatility! 
Read more about MakerDAO and the collaboration here https://medium.com/itam/itam-games-adopts-dai-stablecoin-in-its-gaming-ecosystem-e44dc31be272 …

1120193511188393984.text:
[The Last Spookiz Daily Event Winners!]
Congratulations to the winners of the last few days of the Spookiz Daily Event! Thank you to everyone that participated in the event for the past few weeks.
Please look forward to more events coming on the #ITAMStore :)pic.twitter.com/ZcfE9RI9SU

1120977857339985924.text:
[Introducing ITAM & Social Login]
The feature to log into the #ITAMStore with an ITAM Account and social media accounts is on its way! Users that are unfamiliar with #blockchain and #EOS will now be able to "Play-to-Earn" as well!
Read more https://medium.com/itam/introducing-itam-social-login-257eedcfbec8 …

1123084877992095744.text:
[Space Rider Event - Race to Score 300!!] 
The race to score 300 starts now!! Race through the galactic world of Space Rider, dodging all the obstacles, and score 300 for a chance to win #ITAMTokens!
For more details, visit the #ITAMGames News Telegram  https://t.me/itamgames_news pic.twitter.com/kMCJ295K2v

1121673042088718341.text:
The CCO of #ITAMGames, @JinByeon , speaking at the #YunQi2050 EOS Workshop! :) If you are at the event, go say hi to Damian and ask any questions you may have about ITAM Games! 
#EOS #blockchainpic.twitter.com/VDz0EBBB1y

1123172685863837696.text:
We at #ITAMGames are happy to announce that fiat payments will be available on the ITAM Store with @MoonpayHQ soon! Now, users unfamiliar with #blockchain and #EOS can Play-to-Earn too!

Read more about the upcoming feature here https://medium.com/itam/introducing-fiat-payments-w-moonpay-925c1ea31ccc …

1120575779450933249.text:
The results are in and it looks like A LOT of people are looking forward to an RPG with tradeable NFTs, followed by a game with multiplayer capability! What if I told you the launch of a RPG with NFTs that ALSO has multiplayer feature is on its way

1120245337371734016.text: The feature of logging onto #ITAMStore via ITAM Account and Social Logins (Facebook and Google) are on its way! Users that wanted to Play-to-Earn on the ITAM Store but didn't have #EOS accounts will soon be able to! This new feature is set to release with this week :) #blockchainpic.twitter.com/QP3ro4zaVt

1122755460325449729.text:
The final big announcement of #ITAMGames is here! A new RPG called Dark Town is set to release in May! Dark Town is a RPG with NFTs that also has multiplayer capability. More details on the game and its release will follow soon! :)
Download ITAM Store 
https://itam.store/ pic.twitter.com/HmQNsa3rgs

1121697332834099200.text:
[ITAM Games Bounty Program]
The #ITAMGames #Bounty Program was created to generate exposure for the ITAM Games social media channels, and to attract more users to the ITAM Games ecosystem. Learn more on the ITAM Games website!
Bounty Bot Address: https://t.me/itam_bounty_bot pic.twitter.com/ns61WrBNzy

1120928456634535936.text: The 2nd big announcements of #ITAMGames! A new game called "Space Rider" is set to release this week on the #ITAMStore!
